channel.title: White house says no to death star
channel.description:
http://cosmiclog.nbcnews.com/_news/2013/01/11/16468880-white-house-thumbs-down-on-death-star-thumbs-up-on-space?lite
The petition garnered more than 25,000 online signatures within a month, partly due to a signing campaign that went viral on 4chan, Reddit and Twitter. Under the Obama administration's rules for the "We the People" program, that required the White House to come up with a reply.
lol'd

item.title: White house says no to death star

was pretty interested at the uhm space station though. i didn’t tl;dr it.

item.title: White house says no to death star
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

[ul][li]The construction of the Death Star has been estimated to cost more than $850,000,000,000,000,000. We're working hard to reduce the deficit, not expand it.

[/li][li]The Administration does not support blowing up planets.

[list][li]Why would we spend countless taxpayer dollars on a Death Star with a fundamental flaw that can be exploited by a one-man starship?[/li][/list]
[/li][/ul]

twitter.com

Darth Vader (DarthVader)

A serious mistake, Mr. President. You can never have enough planet-sized lasers - http://t.co/E0TgVnPv #starwars
18:22 - 11. Jan. 2013

Read full topic

item.title: White house says no to death star
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

NBC News

White House: Thumbs down on Death Star, thumbs up on space

The White House says building a Death Star would be an out-of-this-galaxy waste of money — not only because it's against government policy to blow up planets, but also because the United States already has access to a space station as

The petition garnered more than 25,000 online signatures within a month, partly due to a signing campaign that went viral on 4chan, Reddit and Twitter. Under the Obama administration’s rules for the “We the People” program, that required the White House to come up with a reply.

lol’d

Read full topic
item.source: White house says no to death star
